text:
Rainforest QA (YC S12) | SF, Singapore, Remote, International | VISA / Greencard support

Rainforest QA is an on-demand QA solution that allows customers to discover problems that affect their customer experience before code hits production. All done at the speed of continuous delivery.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/rainforest-qa

San Francisco or US Remote:

* Data Science Generalist: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/cb33e9f4-58ea-4d2d-ad3d-50e...

* Senior DevOps Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/d50cd6e9-7432-491b-83d8-51e...

Singapore:

* Data Science Generalist: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/0a54e10d-d517-467b-bef9-b32...

* Senior DevOps Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/bc87e5d6-9d30-4ba2-93cc-5e3...

Global Remote:

* Data Science Generalist: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/cb33e9f4-58ea-4d2d-ad3d-50e...

* Senior DevOps Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/rainforest/adc8d0b2-8c8d-4db2-aeab-c63...

Tech Stack: Ruby, Rails, Grape, Go, Redis, Postgres, QueueClassic, GraphQL, React with redux, KVM, Puppet, Heroku, AWS

I look forward to hearing from you! - Sarah
